text:
What... what's wrong, Kogane...?
Y-You look so... serious.

Oh gosh~~, it ain't nothin' like that~~!
Just practicin' bein' cool~~~!

Yeah~! Our song just ain't gonna
work if we ain't cool enough!

I tend to get so focused on dancin' and singin'
that I forget to keep my expression cool...

...Sure enough, once you get the expressions right,
the performance just draws folks in.

Yep~~! That's right~~!
So, we've been trainin' hard in our free time~~

We wanna show the folks who come to see us...
that we're gonna be absolutely cool!

I gotta become an idol, no doubt about it!
So, I'm gonna take every audition I can get my hands on!

(Kogane hasn't changed a bit. Straightforward
and dedicated, through and through...)

...In that case, count me in too.
Gotta have an audience, right?

Thanks~~ a bunch, Producer! Guess I
gotta get back into gear and be super cool~~!
